column4: Proprietary, option for paid landline and cellular calls via Viber Out https://www.viber.com/
No full or partial desktop client, app is phone centric

Viber's security protocol was based on the "double ratchet" protocol found in Open Whisper Systems Signal application, with our own proprietary implementation and additions. Our entire security overview is available here. https://www.viber.com/en/security/
